title: Twisted Treelin Queue bug
body: On Saturday my 2 friends and I decided to play some good ol' twisted treeline, so we entered queue and waited for a game. we got a game but we noticed it had 10 player icons instead of only 6, we all accepted and it was in a 5v5 draft mode on Summoners rift, the queue had bugged and allowed us a trio queue in solo/duo ranked. This was quite funny but my friends are scrubs and we lost can you look into the queue system.

replies.body: Wow this sounds amazing, I hope they don't fix it.
